thread.title: Kentucky’s Derek Willis proposed to his girlfriend on Senior Night
thread.title_full: Kentucky’s Derek Willis proposed to his girlfriend on Senior Night

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Kentucky’s Derek Willis proposed to his girlfriend on Senior Night
text:
A .
Kentucky forward Derek Willis had more than just Senior Night to celebrate on Tuesday. He proposed to his girlfriend, Keely Potts, during the pregame ceremonies.
Senior Night ✅
Get engaged ✅
What a night for Kentucky's Derek Willis. pic.twitter.com/wljWJNLLUq 
— ESPN College BBall (@ESPNCBB) March 1, 2017 She said yes!
Here’s hoping Kentucky has as bright a future in the tournament as these two do together.
He liked it so he put a ring on it. 

Congratulations to @derek_willis33 and @keelypotts_ . Here's to a lifetime of happiness. pic.twitter.com/i2w8WBpuv6 
— Kentucky Basketball (@KentuckyMBB) March 1, 2017 Congratulations!
